revised_title: Techniques in Diving and Submersibles: A Review of Underwater Technology in the 1990s
tldr: This article discusses various techniques in diving and submersibles that were expected to be used for underwater tasks during the 1990s. It covers options for ambient-pressure divers and underwater vehicles, as well as the safe deployment of these technologies. The article also explores communication, position fixing, and survey work tasks, and the supporting facilities needed for research and development in this field.
